statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM environmental_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' AND sensor_value > 25;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='Humidity' ORDER BY sensor_location ASC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='CO2';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Living Room' AND sensor_value > 25 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Kitchen%' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_location, timestamp;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM environmental_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name, sensor_type HAVING avg_value > 20 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_sensors FROM environmental_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING num_sensors > 3 ORDER BY num_sensors DESC, sensor_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id FROM environmental_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading) AS average_reading FROM environmental_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, reading FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MIN(reading) AS min_reading, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM environmental_sensor_data;
SELECT block_id, hash, prev_hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data INNER JOIN blockchain_data ON environmental_sensor_data.sensor_id = blockchain_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY blockchain_data.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData ORDER BY data_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT hash, timestamp FROM BlockchainData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT sensor_id, data_time, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY data_time ASC;
SELECT entry_id, sensor_id, data_time, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData ORDER BY data_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainData WHERE previous_hash IS NULL;
SELECT sensor_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE location LIKE 'Room%';
SELECT entry_id, sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT entry_id, sensor_id, data_time, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY data_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM sustainability_practices WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT temperature, humidity, location FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, block_id FROM sensor_blockchain_mapping;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT practice_name, verification_status FROM sustainability_practices WHERE practice_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data bd JOIN sensor_blockchain_mapping sbm ON bd.block_id = sbm.block_id WHERE sbm.sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, timestamp FROM environmental_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE hash_value LIKE 'abcdef%';
SELECT practice_name, description FROM sustainability_practices;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type, data_value, timestamp FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type, data_value, timestamp FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE location='Room A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM environmental_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name, sensor_type;

SELECT s.sensor_name, b.hash_value, b.timestamp AS block_timestamp FROM environmental_sensor_data AS s JOIN sensor_blockchain_mapping AS m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id JOIN blockchain_network AS b ON m.block_id = b.block_id ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
